creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: wood cover; eight leaves: two men, one on a donkey, in trees; bearded man with children; man chasing a frog over waves; man with flute riding on flying crane; man riding on donkey; crab in water; figure fishing from a boat; three figures
dimension: 12 1/4 x 8 x 1 in. (31.12 x 20.32 x 2.54 cm) (closed, cover)
title: Album with Eight Leaves
